translations.title: ๐ What is Wudu?
translations.desc: In Islam, Wudu (ablution) is the ritual purification performed before prayers, Qur'an recitation, and acts of worship. It involves washing specific body parts as prescribed in the Qur'an and Sunnah. Wudu is both a physical and spiritual act of cleanliness and readiness for worship.
